cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.DS, cs.IT, cs.SI. 

The paper introduces a new method for approximating the log partition function of a Markov random field, which is a common problem in machine learning and statistical inference. The paper uses techniques from convex optimization and graph theory, which are common in the fields of artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and machine learning (cs.LG). The paper also discusses algorithms for optimizing the lower bounds, which is a topic in optimization and algorithms (cs.DS). The paper also mentions information theory (cs.IT) and statistical inference (cs.SI) as related fields.
